channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title:
周四晚，瑞士一列火车上发生人质劫持事件，经过近 4 个小时后，警方突袭击毙了嫌犯，15 名人质获释。
沃州警方发言人让-克里斯托夫-索泰尔（Jean-Christophe Sauterel）在新闻发布会上说，劫持人质者手持斧头和刀，会说波斯语和英语。
这名男子据称是在用斧头冲向一名警察后被警察击毙的。
item.description:
A hostage situation on a train in Switzerland on Thursday night ended after almost 4 hours with the suspect killed in a police raid and the 15 hostages freed, authorities say.

The hostage-taker was armed with an axe and a knife, and was speaking Farsi and English, Vaud canton police spokesman Jean-Christophe Sauterel said at a press briefing.

The man was shot dead by a police officer after allegedly rushing at him with the axe

item.title:
R to @AFP：#美国总统乔-拜登周四情绪激动地回应了一份质疑他记忆力的特别顾问报告，质问检察官为何敢说他记不起儿子的死亡日期。
他说："甚至有人说我不记得我儿子是什么时候死的。他怎么敢这么说？拜登在白宫对记者说，"我的记忆力很好"。
item.description:
#UPDATE US President Joe Biden launched an emotional response Thursday to a special counsel report questioning his memory, asking how the prosecutor dared say he could not recall the date of his son's death.

"There's even reference that I don't remember when my son died. How in the hell dare he raise that?" Biden told reporters at the White House, adding that "my memory is fine"

item.title:
R to @AFP：#美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）周四表示，以色列在加沙地带对哈马斯 10 月 7 日袭击的军事反应 "过分"。
"他在白宫对记者说："正如你们所知，我认为以色列在加沙地带采取的应对措施是过分的。
item.description:
#UPDATE Israel's military response in the Gaza Strip to the October 7 attacks by Hamas has been "over the top," US President Joe Biden said Thursday.

"I'm of the view, as you know, that the conduct of the response in Gaza, in the Gaza Strip, has been over the top," he told reporters at the White House

item.title: R to @AFP：#最新消息 普京总统在周四接受有争议的美国右翼记者塔克-卡尔森（Tucker Carlson）采访时说，西方应该明白，在乌克兰打败俄罗斯是 "不可能的"。 点击这里阅读⬇️
item.description:

item.title: 周五，巴基斯坦大选因被指控操纵选举而备受争议，而该国最受欢迎的政治家伊姆兰-汗（Imran Khan）却在狱中备受煎熬。 点击这里阅读⬇️
item.description:
Officials ordered returning officers to speed up the release of results Friday following a Pakistan election marred by rigging allegations, while the country's most popular politician Imran Khan languished in jail.

item.title: R to @AFP：周四，一份期待已久的报告证明乔-拜登总统在不当处理机密文件方面没有任何过错，但却投下了一枚政治炸弹，将这位民主党人描绘成一位 "善意的、记忆力不好的老人"。
item.description:
A long-awaited report cleared President Joe Biden of any wrongdoing in his mishandling of classified documents Thursday but dropped a political bombshell by painting the Democrat as a "well-meaning, elderly man with a poor memory."
u.afp.com/5GMW

item.title: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙周四在一系列争议之后撤换了他的教育部长，试图在总理加布里埃尔-阿塔尔的领导下为其总统任期的最后阶段重振势头。 报道：@ffontemaggi
item.description:
French President Emmanuel Macron on Thursday replaced his education minister after a series of controversies, seeking to regain momentum for the final phase of his presidency under Prime Minister Gabriel Attal.
Story by @ffontemaggi
u.afp.com/5GMP

item.title: 视频 出生在法国 Cerza 动物园的三个月大的露西是白犀牛的两个亚种之一。
item.description: VIDEO Three-month-old Lucy, born in France's Cerza zoo is one of the two subspecies of the white rhinoceros which is considered to be under threat

item.title: Meta 周四表示，它已删除了伊朗最高领袖阿亚图拉-阿里-哈梅内伊的 Facebook 和 Instagram 账户，原因是其违反了内容政策。 点击这里阅读➡️
item.description:

item.title: 包括前国务卿希拉里-克林顿在内的专家警告说，终止对乌克兰的援助将标志着美国领导权的断裂和北约的分裂。报道：@NicolasRevise ➡️
item.description: Ending aid to Ukraine would mark a rupture of US leadership and a fracturing of NATO, warned experts including former secretary of state Hillary Clinton who raised the alarm over Donald Trump's possible reelection. Story by @NicolasRevise ➡️u.afp.com/5GMN

item.title: 视频 本周，数以百万计的城市居民挤在火车车厢里，离开中国各大城市返回家乡，共享美食，向长辈拜年，并为即将到来的龙年送上祝福。
item.description: VIDEO Packed into train carriages, millions of urbanites this week leave China's major cities for their hometowns to share meals, pay respects to their elders and deliver blessings for the upcoming Year of the Dragon

item.title: R to @AFP：乌克兰最高指挥官瓦列里-扎卢日尼（Valery Zaluzhny）周四被免职，这是自近两年前俄罗斯入侵以来基辅军事领导层最大的一次动荡。更多信息⬇️
item.description:

item.title: R to @AFP：#美国海军陆战队周四表示，本周在加利福尼亚州南部坠毁的直升机上失踪的五名美国军人已被确认死亡。 "第三海军陆战队飞机联队指挥官迈克尔-博格舒尔特（Michael Borgschulte）少将在一份声明中说："我怀着沉重的心情和深切的悲痛，与大家分享周二晚在进行训练飞行时，来自第三海军陆战队飞机联队和'飞虎队'的五名优秀海军陆战队员遇难的消息。
item.description:
#UPDATE Five US service members missing after their helicopter crashed this week in southern California have been confirmed dead, the US Marine Corps said Thursday.
"It is with a heavy heart and profound sadness that I share the loss of five outstanding Marines from 3d Marine Aircraft Wing and the 'Flying Tigers' while conducting a training flight" on Tuesday night, Major General Michael Borgschulte, commander of the Third Marine Aircraft Wing, said in a statement

item.title: R to @AFP：#UPDATE 内政部表示，在大选投票期间长达一天的停电之后，周四巴基斯坦全国各地的移动电话服务正在逐步恢复➡️。
item.description: #UPDATE Mobile phone services were being gradually restored across Pakistan on Thursday, the interior ministry said, after a day-long blackout during voting in general elections➡️ u.afp.com/5GNd

item.description: #UPDATE Israel's reported ongoing destruction of all buildings along the border inside Gaza with the aim of creating a "buffer zone" is a war crime, the United Nations rights chief warned on Thursday ➡️ u.afp.com/5GYM

item.title:
视频：🇨🇫 "沙钓 "是非洲中部贫困地区一条危险的生命线
在乌班吉河（Ubangi River）畔，工人们的目标不是鱼，而是中非共和国经济的另一种重要商品：沙子。
梅利诺-班迪奥 📷 @AnnelaNiamolo #AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇨🇫 'Sandfishing' a risky lifeline in impoverished C. Africa

On the banks of the Ubangi River, it's not fish the workers are after but another crucial commodity for the Central African Republic's economy: sand.

📹 Melino BANDIO
📷 @AnnelaNiamolo
#AFPVertical

VIDEO: 🇯🇵 World's slowest horse races wins new fans in Japan

The Banei Keiba races in the city of Obihiro, on Hokkaido, saw a surge of interest during the pandemic when people began to watch the races and place bets online.

📹 @atishpatel
📸 @fong_fifi
#AFPVertical
